user_question: Between Java and WP, how large is the difference in percentage of their global developers mindshare?

knowledge_chain.raw_result:
The provided context contains no information regarding the global developer mindshare percentage for Java in 2023. All referenced data pertains to mobile platform developer distributions (Android, iOS, Windows Phone, etc.) and app store metrics from Q3 2015, as documented in the report "reportq32015-151009093138-lva1-app6891_95.pdf". There is no mention of Java as a development platform, nor any data extending beyond 2015.

Therefore, based on the given context, it is not possible to determine the global developer mindshare percentage for Java in 2023.
